body_html:
I've bisected it to #9763 . In addition with running a few experiments comparing JIT LSTM to aten LSTMs, the problem looks like JIT overhead -- I'm seeing a lot of extra CUDA mallocs with the JIT LSTM and sometimes OOMs and am still investigating.

cc @apaszke do you have any ideas on what could be going on?

cc @apaszke do you have any ideas on what could be going on?
body:
I've bisected it to https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/9763 . In addition with running a few experiments comparing JIT LSTM to aten LSTMs, the problem looks like JIT overhead -- I'm seeing a lot of extra CUDA mallocs with the JIT LSTM and sometimes OOMs and am still investigating.

cc @apaszke do you have any ideas on what could be going on?
